short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skips the Google redirect pages and takes you straight there

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skips the Google redirect pages (https://www.google.com/url*) and just takes you directly to the web page. This is often useful because that Google redirect page not only tracks you but is often slow causing your web surfing to be slow. No more!
